20101227050331.000|20101227050335.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING, EVERYONE.      
20101227050335.000|20101227050338.000|CC1|I'M SHUJA NAWAZ, DIRECTOR.      
20101227050338.000|20101227050341.000|CC1|ON BEHALF OF THE COUNCIL I WOULD
20101227050341.000|20101227050343.000|CC1|LIKE TO WELCOME ALL OF YOU TO   
20101227050343.000|20101227050346.000|CC1|OUR FINAL EVENT FOR 2010.

20101227050348.000|20101227050350.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY FOR THE REGION THAT
20101227050350.000|20101227050353.000|CC1|WE COVER, GREATER SOUTH ASIA,   
20101227050353.000|20101227050355.000|CC1|WHICH INCLUDES GEOGRAPHIC SOUTH 
20101227050355.000|20101227050359.000|CC1|ASIA, THE GULF, A RON,          
20101227050359.000|20101227050400.000|CC1|AFGHANISTAN, AND CENTRAL ASIA.  
20101227050400.000|20101227050402.000|CC1|I AM DELIGHTED THAT JOINING ME  
20101227050402.000|20101227050404.000|CC1|HERE TODAY ARE TWO EXPERTS ON   
20101227050404.000|20101227050410.000|CC1|THE REGION, A VISITING SCHOLAR  
20101227050410.000|20101227050412.000|CC1|AT THE CARNEGIE ENDOWMENT IN    
20101227050412.000|20101227050414.000|CC1|WASHINGTON.                     
20101227050414.000|20101227050418.000|CC1|HE IS ADVERTISED AT CARNEGIE AS 
20101227050418.000|20101227050420.000|CC1|AN EXPERT ON AFGHANISTAN, BUT I 
20101227050420.000|20101227050423.000|CC1|WOULD EXPAND THAT TO INCLUDE    
20101227050423.000|20101227050424.000|CC1|PAKISTAN BECAUSE HE IS ONE OF   
20101227050424.000|20101227050427.000|CC1|THE FEW PEOPLE THAT HAS ACTUALLY
20101227050427.000|20101227050427.000|CC1|TRAVELED AND KNOWS WELL THE     
20101227050427.000|20101227050429.000|CC1|BORDER REGION BETWEEN THE TWO   
20101227050429.000|20101227050431.000|CC1|COUNTRIES.                      
20101227050431.000|20101227050433.000|CC1|HIS RESEARCH IS FOCUSED ON      
20101227050433.000|20101227050434.000|CC1|SECURITY AND POLITICAL          
20101227050434.000|20101227050437.000|CC1|DEVELOPMENT IN AFGHANISTAN AND  
20101227050437.000|20101227050440.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY THE ROLE OF        
20101227050440.000|20101227050440.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL SECURITY          
20101227050440.000|20101227050442.000|CC1|ASSISTANCE AS WELL AS LOOKING AT
20101227050442.000|20101227050444.000|CC1|WHAT WOULD CONSTITUTE A VIABLE  
20101227050444.000|20101227050449.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN KABUL AND ALSO    
20101227050449.000|20101227050450.000|CC1|DRYING SCENARIOS.               
20101227050450.000|20101227050451.000|CC1|A VERY APPROPRIATE PERSON TO    
20101227050451.000|20101227050454.000|CC1|HAVE WITH US.                   
20101227050454.000|20101227050456.000|CC1|PREVIOUSLY HE WAS A PROFESSOR OF
20101227050456.000|20101227050459.000|CC1|POLITICAL SCIENCE IN PARIS AND  
20101227050459.000|20101227050502.000|CC1|AT THE INSTITUTE OF POLITICAL   
20101227050502.000|20101227050503.000|CC1|STUDIES.                        
20101227050503.000|20101227050504.000|CC1|HE HAS ALSO SERVED AS THE       
20101227050504.000|20101227050506.000|CC1|SCIENTIFIC COORDINATOR AT THE   
20101227050506.000|20101227050508.000|CC1|FRENCH INSTITUTE OF AN ITALIAN  
20101227050508.000|20101227050511.000|CC1|STUDIES IN TURKEY.

20101227050514.000|20101227050515.000|CC1|ATTRIBUTES AND BACKGROUNDS,     
20101227050515.000|20101227050516.000|CC1|WHICH I WON'T GET INTO AT THIS  
20101227050516.000|20101227050518.000|CC1|POINT, BUT WE ARE DELIGHTED THAT
20101227050518.000|20101227050520.000|CC1|HE AGREED TO PARTICIPATE.       
20101227050520.000|20101227050522.000|CC1|WE ARE ALSO HAPPY TO WELCOME    
20101227050522.000|20101227050526.000|CC1|BACK TO THE SOUTH ASIA CENTER   
20101227050526.000|20101227050529.000|CC1|MR. IKRAM SEHGAL WHO IS A       
20101227050529.000|20101227050533.000|CC1|BUSINESSMAN AND A COLUMNIST AND 
20101227050533.000|20101227050535.000|CC1|FORMER MILITARY OFFICER FROM    
20101227050535.000|20101227050536.000|CC1|PAKISTAN.                       
20101227050536.000|20101227050538.000|CC1|HE IS NOW CURRENTLY THE CHAIRMAN
20101227050538.000|20101227050544.000|CC1|OF A GROUP CALLED PATHFINDER G. 
20101227050544.000|20101227050545.000|CC1|HE WRITES A REGULAR COLUMN FOR  
20101227050545.000|20101227050548.000|CC1|ONE OF THE LEADING PAKISTAN     
20101227050548.000|20101227050549.000|CC1|NEWSPAPERS.                     
20101227050549.000|20101227050551.000|CC1|WE ARE DELIGHTED THAT HE HAS    
20101227050551.000|20101227050552.000|CC1|JOINED US TODAY TO HELP SHED    
20101227050552.000|20101227050554.000|CC1|LIGHT ON WHAT IS HAPPENING.     
20101227050554.000|20101227050557.000|CC1|FOR THOSE OF YOU THAT WERE      
20101227050557.000|20101227050558.000|CC1|EXPECTING A THIRD MEMBER OF OUR 
20101227050558.000|20101227050603.000|CC1|PANEL, AS WERE WE, I'M KRISTINE 
20101227050603.000|20101227050604.000|CC1|WAS UNABLE TO COME BECAUSE OF   
20101227050604.000|20101227050605.000|CC1|ILLNESS.                        
20101227050605.000|20101227050607.000|CC1|WE WILL MISS HER.               
20101227050607.000|20101227050610.000|CC1|I WILL SEE IF I CAN DO MY BEST  
20101227050610.000|20101227050611.000|CC1|TO STAND IN FOR HER, BUT I'M    
20101227050611.000|20101227050614.000|CC1|SURE THAT'S NOT GOING TO BE     
20101227050614.000|20101227050614.000|CC1|ADEQUATE.                       
20101227050614.000|20101227050617.000|CC1|I JUST WANT TO US, AGAIN, BEGAN 
20101227050617.000|20101227050620.000|CC1|WITH A FEW REMARKS TO SET THAT  
20101227050620.000|20101227050621.000|CC1|BEING.                          
20101227050621.000|20101227050623.000|CC1|THEN I WILL REQUEST EACH OF THE 
20101227050623.000|20101227050624.000|CC1|PANELISTS SPEAK FOR ABOUT TEN

20101227050628.000|20101227050631.000|CC1|FROM THE AUDIENCE.

20101227050633.000|20101227050634.000|CC1|PLEASE WAIT FOR THE MICROPHONE  
20101227050634.000|20101227050637.000|CC1|TO REACH YOU.                   
20101227050637.000|20101227050639.000|CC1|THEN PLEASE A IDENTIFY YOURSELF 
20101227050639.000|20101227050641.000|CC1|FOR THE AUDIENCE AND FOR THE    
20101227050641.000|20101227050643.000|CC1|RECORDING THAT WE ARE DEALING   
20101227050643.000|20101227050645.000|CC1|SIMULTANEOUSLY.                 
20101227050645.000|20101227050647.000|CC1|LOOKING BACK ON 2010, IT HAS    
20101227050647.000|20101227050650.000|CC1|BEEN A TUMULTUOUS YEAR,         
20101227050650.000|20101227050652.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY FOR OUR REGION, BUT
20101227050652.000|20101227050655.000|CC1|A YEAR OF SOMEWHAT MIXED        
20101227050655.000|20101227050656.000|CC1|RESULTS.                        
20101227050656.000|20101227050658.000|CC1|VERY QUICKLY AS I SCANNED THE   
20101227050658.000|20101227050702.000|CC1|REGION AS THE INDIA OUTPACING   
20101227050702.000|20101227050703.000|CC1|ITS NEIGHBORS ECONOMICALLY AND  
20101227050703.000|20101227050706.000|CC1|POLITICALLY.                    
20101227050706.000|20101227050707.000|CC1|PAKISTAN ENDS THE YEAR IN DIRE  
20101227050707.000|20101227050709.000|CC1|ECONOMIC STRAITS AND A POLITICAL
20101227050709.000|20101227050712.000|CC1|SYSTEM THAT IS STILL VERY MUCH  
20101227050712.000|20101227050715.000|CC1|PRESENT BY NOT JUST THE         
20101227050715.000|20101227050716.000|CC1|OPPOSITION, BUT MEMBERS OF THE  
20101227050716.000|20101227050717.000|CC1|COALITION OF THE PAKISTAN       
20101227050717.000|20101227050721.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S PARTY THAT APPEAR TO BE
20101227050721.000|20101227050723.000|CC1|LEVERAGING THEIR POSITION INSIDE
20101227050723.000|20101227050725.000|CC1|THE COALITION TO GET THEIR OUNCE
20101227050725.000|20101227050726.000|CC1|OF FLESH FROM THE GOVERNMENT.   
20101227050726.000|20101227050728.000|CC1|AS A RESULT JOINING THE EFFORTS 
20101227050728.000|20101227050731.000|CC1|TO MOVE FORWARD.                
20101227050731.000|20101227050733.000|CC1|IN AFGHANISTAN THERE APPEAR TO  
20101227050733.000|20101227050736.000|CC1|BE SIGNS OF HOPE, BOTH LOCALLY  
20101227050736.000|20101227050738.000|CC1|AND IN TERMS OF WHAT THE        
20101227050738.000|20101227050740.000|CC1|COALITION IS TRYING TO DO.      
20101227050740.000|20101227050741.000|CC1|THE BIG TEST WILL OBVIOUSLY COME
20101227050741.000|20101227050745.000|CC1|IN THE YEAR AHEAD.              
20101227050745.000|20101227050748.000|CC1|ENRON IS GETTING READY YET      
20101227050748.000|20101227050749.000|CC1|AGAIN.                          
20101227050749.000|20101227050750.000|CC1|THERE IS SOME HOPE THAT THERE   
20101227050750.000|20101227050753.000|CC1|WILL BE SOME PROGRESS.          
20101227050753.000|20101227050755.000|CC1|AGAIN, AS IS USUALLY THE CASE   
20101227050755.000|20101227050757.000|CC1|WITH THESE TALKS ONE DOES NOT   
20101227050757.000|20101227050758.000|CC1|KNOW IF IT WILL BE TWO STEPS    
20101227050758.000|20101227050800.000|CC1|FORWARD AND ONE BACK OR WHETHER 
20101227050800.000|20101227050802.000|CC1|ONE STEP FORWARD AND TO BACK.   
20101227050802.000|20101227050804.000|CC1|WE WILL WAIT TO SEE HOW THINGS  
20101227050804.000|20101227050807.000|CC1|PROGRESS IN 2011.               
20101227050807.000|20101227050809.000|CC1|SHERLOCK DECK, THE GOOD NEWS IS 
20101227050809.000|20101227050811.000|CC1|IT IS NO LONGER IN THE NEWS.    
20101227050811.000|20101227050813.000|CC1|THINGS ARE STABILIZING AND      
20101227050813.000|20101227050815.000|CC1|CONSOLIDATING THE PIECE THAT    
20101227050815.000|20101227050818.000|CC1|THEY FOUGHT HARD TO ACHIEVE.    
20101227050818.000|20101227050820.000|CC1|THE GOOD NEWS ABOUT BANGLADESH  
20101227050820.000|20101227050824.000|CC1|IS THAT IT IS BACK ON THE PATH  
20101227050824.000|20101227050827.000|CC1|OF DEMOCRACY AND GROWTH.        
20101227050827.000|20101227050828.000|CC1|IN NEPAL AND OTHER COUNTRIES    
20101227050828.000|20101227050830.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY DOES STILL SEEM TO BE 
20101227050830.000|20101227050833.000|CC1|FUNCTIONING.                    
20101227050833.000|20101227050834.000|CC1|THAT IS ONE OF THE REASONS WHY  
20101227050834.000|20101227050838.000|CC1|WE ARE HERE TODAY, TO TALK ABOUT
20101227050838.000|20101227050839.000|CC1|THINGS.                         
20101227050839.000|20101227050842.000|CC1|JUST A FEW WORDS ABOUT INDIA.   
20101227050842.000|20101227050843.000|CC1|INDIA HAD THE HEADLINE AND GOT  
20101227050843.000|20101227050847.000|CC1|THE JACKPOT THIS YEAR.          
20101227050847.000|20101227050849.000|CC1|ALL FIVE MEMBERS OF THE SECURITY
20101227050849.000|20101227050852.000|CC1|COUNCIL OF THE UNITED NATIONS   
20101227050852.000|20101227050855.000|CC1|MADE THE PILGRIMAGE TO NEW DELHI
20101227050855.000|20101227050858.000|CC1|WITH A VIEW TO SEEKING CLOSER   
20101227050858.000|20101227050900.000|CC1|TIES AND ECONOMIC RELATIONSHIPS 
20101227050900.000|20101227050906.000|CC1|AND ALSO, IF THEY COULD, TO PACE
20101227050906.000|20101227050907.000|CC1|ECONOMIC RELATIONSHIPS ON       
20101227050907.000|20101227050910.000|CC1|MILITARY SALES ON NUCLEAR SALES.
20101227050910.000|20101227050913.000|CC1|EVERYONE GOT SOMETHING.         
20101227050913.000|20101227050915.000|CC1|I THINK OF ALL THE VISITORS TO  
20101227050915.000|20101227050918.000|CC1|CHINA PROBABLY GET THE PRIZE    
20101227050918.000|20101227050920.000|CC1|BECAUSE CHINA MANAGED TO NOT    
20101227050920.000|20101227050922.000|CC1|ONLY GET TO INDIA, BUT ALSO     
20101227050922.000|20101227050923.000|CC1|FOLLOW IT UP IMMEDIATELY WITH   
20101227050923.000|20101227050926.000|CC1|THE VISIT TO PAKISTAN WHERE HE  
20101227050926.000|20101227050927.000|CC1|ALSO SIGNED A MULTI-BILLION     
20101227050927.000|20101227050929.000|CC1|DOLLAR DEALS.                   
20101227050929.000|20101227050934.000|CC1|SO OF THE FIVE MAJOR BIDDERS TO 
20101227050934.000|20101227050938.000|CC1|INDIA CHINA WAS THE BEST IN THE 
20101227050938.000|20101227050939.000|CC1|REGION.                         
20101227050939.000|20101227050942.000|CC1|I CANNOT TALK ABOUT 2010 WITHOUT
20101227050942.000|20101227050945.000|CC1|MENTIONING THE WAY THAT THE YEAR
20101227050945.000|20101227050949.000|CC1|HAS ENDED, WITH A HUGE LOSS WITH
